title: Manage Hazmat Spill Incident
description: A truck has overturned, spilling a hazardous chemical. An operator must coordinate a multi-agency response.

tasks.description: Receive a 911 call about an overturned truck and identify the chemical from the truck's placard number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the hazardous material involved.

tasks.description: Establish an exclusion zone around the spill and dispatch the specialized fire department Hazmat team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the safety perimeter and dispatches the correct team.

tasks.description: Notify the environmental protection agency and public health department of the spill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly notifies all required external agencies.
